results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከእነርሱ ለየሰው ሁሉ በዚያ ቀን (ከሌላው) የሚያብቃቃው ኹነታ አልለው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ፊቶችም በዚያ ቀን በላያቸው ላይ ትቢያ አልለባቸው፤
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
